title: All Players Draw 5
description: All players must draw 5 cards except you.

title: Change Color, Next Draws 4 🚫
description: Change the color, and if the next player doesn't have it, they must draw 4 cards. NO OVERWRITE

title: Deadly Uno
description: every player must give there all cards to the next player.

title: Delayed Blast
description: Choose any player who will have to draw 5 cards after their next turn, no matter what they play.

title: Discard One Color, Next Draws 5
description: Clearing a color requires one card left in hand; next player draws five.

title: Discard Same Number
description: You can discard all cards with the same number at once. If you have only one card left in your hand, you cannot discard it. The next player must draw 2 cards.

title: Draw Chain
description: When the User plays this card, the first person after user picks 1 card, second picks 2 cards and so on..

title: Draw Until Even Card 🚫
description: The next player must draw until they get an even-numbered card. NO OVERWRITE

title: Draw Until Wild Card
description: No stopping until you get a Wild card!

title: Give Half to Next Player
description: The unlucky next player must take half your hand.

title: Hand Fusion
description: Combine your hand with the next player's hand and split the combined cards evenly between both of you. Odd cards go to the next player clockwise.

title: Lose Hand and Draw 7
description: The next player loses their entire hand and draws 7 fresh cards.

title: No Special Cards
description: Special cards cannot be played for one round. no choosing color

title: Random Draw
description: Draw 2 random cards from another player's hand and add them to your own.

title: Reveal Your Hand
description: Next Player plays with your cards exposed until your next turn.

title: Shuffle and Distribute
description: Shuffle all the cards except yours and distribute them.

title: Shuffle and Play 🚫
description: Shuffle the deck and play one card from your hand. NO OVERWRITE

title: Skip Two Turns
description: The next player skips two turns.

title: Sudden Death
description: All players drop their hands. Dealer deal one card each. Show em. Highest/lowest card wins.

title: Swap Hands
description: You can swap hands with any player of your choice.

title: Swap Hands with Fewest Cards Player
description: Give them your large hand and take their small one.

title: Take 15 Cards
description: You must draw 15 cards from the deck.

title: Trade Hands
description: Trade hands with the player next to you.

title: Ultimate Uno
description: All players must play with open cards for one round.

title: Time Bomb 🚫
description: After being played, this card stays in effect for the next three players. The first two players are skipped, and on the third player’s turn, if they have a "Skip" card, they avoid drawing 10 cards and pass the effect to the next player. This continues until a "Skip" card is played; otherwise, the player must draw 10 cards.

title: Wildest Card
description: Lose your hand,Choose color and take one card for the deck.

title: One for One 🚫
description: Take one wild card from the discard pile. The picked card overwrite is discarded

title: Force Swap 🚫
description: Force two players of your choice to swap hands. You cannot include yourself.

title: All-in Draw
description: All players(excluding you) draw cards equal to the number of cards in their own hand.

title: Tit for Tat 🚫
description: Cancel the effect of the last Draw card played against you and return it to the player who used it.🖕🏿

title: Force Play
description: Choose a player and force them to discard their power card you can choose the card. If they dont have it draw +2

title: Trap Card 🚫
description: Place this card face down in front of a player. When their turn comes, they must draw 3 cards unless they play a power card. NO OVERWRITE.

title: Chain Reaction 🚫
description: If the next player has the same number as yours, they can stack it, and the chain continues. No Wildcard to be played.If it breaks, the last player in the chain draws 6 cards.
